DOC.brief_title: Post Market Clinical Follow-up Study IrisFITTM PFO ( Patent Foramen Ovale ) Occluder

The patient screen ( pre-procedure ) determine eligibility study . At screening , patient assess study eligibility inclusion/exclusion criterion medical history , demographic transthoracic echocardiography ( TTE ) . Participating patient PFO close use IrisFITTM PFO Occluder device . The patient undergo clinical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory assessment transthoracic echocardiography ( TTE ) . All periprocedural procedure perform accord siteÂ´s standard care.. The efficacy safety device assess ECGs , vital sign , physical examination TTE , do 1day , 1month 6 month post procedure . Safety also assess 12 month telephone visit .
